Name: Reli-Torc
LongDescription: Protects the Pokémon from having its moves disabled. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Relicanth.  Finding a Reli-Torc at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
